title: Theodore Roosevelt Birthplace National Historic Site: Maps
body: Maps           This is a map shows part of New York City's 18th Ward, Theodore Roosevelt's neighborhood until he was 14 years old, as it looked in 1879. Theodore Roosevelt Birthplace is at 28 East 20th Street, between Broadway and Fourth Avenue (now Park Avenue South). The location of the house is noted by the red dot. David Rumsey Historical Map Collection       In a large city like New York, a small brownstone house may be a little hard to find. Theodore Roosevelt Birthplace is located at 28 East 20th Street, between Park Avenue South and Broadway in Manhattan's historic Gramercy Park District. If you would like to see where exactly we are, here is a map to guide you!
